amendment.description: to restore funding the COPS Methamphetamine Enforcement and Clean Up Program to 2005 levels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 192 agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 192 proposed by Senator Lincoln. (consideration: CR S2938-2939; text: CR S2939; text as modified: CR H2939) to restore funding the COPS Methamphetamine Enforcement and Clean Up Program to 2005 levels.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 192 agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 192 proposed by Senator Lincoln.
